info.name: AI Bricks Backend API v1.0.0
info.description:
Complete API collection for AI Bricks Backend Platform

**Base URL:** `http://localhost:3000/api`

**Version:** 1.0.0

**Features:**
- Property management with embedded seller data
- User authentication and authorization
- Advanced search and filtering
- Contact form submission (public POST, admin GET)
- Property visit scheduling (public POST, admin GET)
- I am interested form (public POST, admin GET)
- Admin-only data retrieval endpoints
- Default admin user: admin@gmail.com / admin@123
- Performance optimized (seller data denormalized)

request.description: Check if the API is running and healthy

item.name: Authentication v1

exec: console.log("Token and User ID saved to environment");

request.description: Register a new user account. Returns JWT token for authentication.

response.name: Error - Email Already Exists

exec: console.log("Token and User ID saved to environment");

request.description: Login user and get JWT token for authentication.
Get the current logged-in user's profile. Requires authentication.

response.name: Error - Unauthorized

request.description: Update the current user's profile. Requires authentication.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration, login, and profile management

item.name: Properties v1

query.description: Filter by property type (Apartment, Villa, Townhouse, etc.)
Filter by status (Ready to Move, Under Construction, Resale)

request.description: Get all properties with optional filters. Seller info is embedded directly in each property for optimal performance.

response.name: Success - With Filters
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "count": 2,
  "data": [
    {

request.description: Create a new property. Seller info is embedded directly in the property document. Requires authentication. Only required fields are propertyTitle and propertyType.

response.name: Success

body.raw:

  "locality": "Andheri",

}

item.description: Contact form endpoints. POST is public (no authentication required). GET endpoints are admin only.

item.name: Schedule Visit v1

request.description: Schedule a property visit. Public endpoint - no authentication required. Requires a valid property ID.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Visit scheduled successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": "visit-id-123",
    "propertyId": "property-id-123",
    "propertyTitle": "Luxury 3 BHK Apartment",
    "name": "John Doe",
    "phoneNumber": "+919876543210",
    "date": "2024-12-25T00:00:00.000Z",
    "time": "14:30",
    "requireCab": true,
    "status": "pending",
    "createdAt": "2026-01-12T10:30:00.000Z"
  }
}
